Output.name: Sample Rate (Hz)
Output.help:
The sample rate represent the number of samples encoded per second
A higher value allow better performances while a lower value allow better precision

Output.name: Block Size
Output.help: The block size represent the number of samples the output device will take each time plays audio

Output.name: Process Block Size
Output.help:
The process block size represent the number of samples for each process frame
A higher value allow better performances while a lower value allow better precision

Performance.name: Sound meter tick rate (audio frame interval)
Performance.help: Change the tick rate of sound meters in milliseconds

Workspaces.name: Workspace directories
Workspaces.help: Every directories of the workspace view
